member.name: interop.Int64FromLuid
member.summary: Converts from a LUID to a 64-bit signed integer.
member.returns: The LUID converted to a 64-bit signed integer.

member.name: interop.LuidFromInt64
member.summary: Converts from a 64-bit signed integer to a LUID.
member.returns: The 64-bit signed integer converted to a LUID.
